Name: Oracle - Create User If Not Exists
Description: Creates a new user account on a Oracle database server
Author: twerthi

Parameters.Name: oracleDBServerName
Parameters.Label: Oracle Server
Parameters.HelpText: Host name of the Oracle server

Parameters.Name: oracleDBServerPort
Parameters.Label: Port
Parameters.HelpText: Port number the Oracle server listens on.

Parameters.Name: oracleLoginWithAddUserRights
Parameters.Label: Admin Login name
Parameters.HelpText: Login name of a user with rights to create user accounts.

Parameters.Name: oracleNewUsername
Parameters.Label: New user name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the new user account to create.

Parameters.Name: oracleNewUserPassword
Parameters.Label: New user password
Parameters.HelpText: Password for the new user account.
